quoteLast: . Travers hesitated no longer. He unbuttoned his top-coat, and, with cap in hand as though he were a guest just come in from a stroll before dinner, he opened the hall door.
title: The Burglars' Club: A Romance in Twelve Chronicles
author: Hering, Henry Augustus, 1864-; Townsend, F. H. (Frederick Henry), 1868-1920 [Illustrator]

quoteFirst: Makes this month a direct motion of four degrees and two seconds of arc, a greater advance than he has made for several months. He rises after daylight and sets on the 1st at 9:06 p. m., on the 15th at
quoteLast: , and on the 30th at 7:29 p. m.
title: The Chautauquan, Vol. 04, May 1884, No. 8
author: Chautauqua Literary and Scientific Circle; Chautauqua Institution; Flood, Theodore L., 1842- [Editor]
